title: Tour de France Team With ‘Smallest Budget’ Has Won The Most Prize Money So Far
content:
Two stage wins have harvested more than 43,000 euros for an underdog team, while Decathlon AG2R La Mondiale Team languishes at the bottom with only 2,390 euros.

Read the full article at Tour de France Team With ‘Smallest Budget’ Has Won The Most Prize Money So Far on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
